text: It is not our purpose to discuss this dictum. Suffice to say that few of us stop to home from the chase hold forth from a spear the welcome gobbet of meat or fish burnt and roasted in the homely and protecting flame.
handwritten_text: It is not our purpose to discuss this dictum. Suffice to say that few of us stop to home from the chase hold forth from a spear the welcome gobbet of meat or fish burnt and roasted in the homely and protecting flame.
